SQL.LOAD: SELECT reference_id, table_name, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, (nvl(quantity, 0) - nvl(reserve_qty, 0)) as quantity, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, vendor_quantity_id, price_list_detail_id FROM elp_vendor_quantity WHERE vendor_quantity_id = :vendor_quantity_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_vendor_quantity SET reference_id = :reference_id, table_name = :table_name, vendor_sku = :vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description = :vendor_sku_description, quantity = :quantity, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE vendor_quantity_id = :vendor_quantity_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_vendor_quantity ( reference_id, table_name, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, quantity, created_by, vendor_quantity_id, price_list_detail_id ) VALUES ( :reference_id, :table_name, :vendor_sku, :vendor_sku_description, :quantity, :created_by, :vendor_quantity_id, :price_list_detail_id )
SQL.INSERT_QUANTITY_FOR_SERVICE_CENTER: INSERT INTO elp_vendor_quantity ( VENDOR_QUANTITY_ID, REFERENCE_ID, TABLE_NAME, VENDOR_SKU, VENDOR_SKU_DESCRIPTION, QUANTITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, PRICE_LIST_DETAIL_ID ) values ( :VENDOR_QUANTITY_ID, :REFERENCE_ID, :TABLE_NAME, :VENDOR_SKU, :VENDOR_SKU_DESCRIPTION, :QUANTITY, :CREATED_BY, :CREATED_DATE, :PRICE_LIST_DETAIL_ID )
